dcterms:description: The pancreas-CT dataset utilized in this study was obtained from the National Institutes of Health Clinical Center. The dataset comprises 82 3D abdominal contrast-enhanced CT scans acquired using Philips and Siemens MDCT scanners.
dcterms:title: Pancreas-CT dataset

dcterms:description: The LA (Left Atrium) dataset, established as a benchmark dataset for the 2018 Atrial Segmentation Challenge, encompasses 154 gadolinium-enhanced MR scans with an isotropic resolution of 0.625 × 0.625 × 0.625 mm3.
dcterms:title: LA (Left Atrium) dataset

dcterms:creator: O. Bernard

dcterms:description: The ACDC (Automated Cardiac Diagnosis Challenge) dataset was curated from real clinical exams conducted at the University Hospital of Dijon. This dataset comprises cardiac MR imaging samples obtained from 100 patients, featuring a short-axis in-plane spatial resolution ranging from 0.83 to 1.75 mm2/pixel.
dcterms:title: ACDC (Automated Cardiac Diagnosis Challenge) dataset
